resources.string:
اضغط على زر التالي لتمكين أو تعطيل الإشعاراتtring> تبديل الإشعارات هل تستخدم MIUI؟ قبل استخدام هذا التطبيق، عليك\'ll ربما تحتاج إلى إعطائها بعض الركود عندما يتعلق الأمر بالأمن.\n1. انتقل إلى إعدادات النظام> جميع> التطبيقات>> التحميلات ثم برنامج الإشعارات.\n2. تبديل التبديل تفيد \ 'مشاهدة النوافذ المنبثقة \' (الخيار الثاني).\n3. في الجزء السفلي، انتقل إلى \ "إدارة الأذونات\'.\n4.ضبط \ "أنا واثق من هذا التطبيق \ 'على. مثل ما ترى؟ تحقق من التطبيقات الأخرى كذلك: زيارة Simen.codes تصفية التطبيق أولوية الإشعار تصفية الإشعارات على أساس أولويتها. \ يتطلب نظام 4.1 قم بإلغاء التطبيق لكتم عليه. يمكنك أيضا الاستفادة من والاستمرار على زر X على التنبيه لكتم التطبيق. تحقق التطبيق للحفاظ على الإشعارات من التدخل في الوقت الذي كنت استخدامها. حظر التطبيق النمط عرض على شاشة القفل .عرض الإشعارات على شاشة القفل
إذا صادف التطبيق مشكلة مؤخرا استفادة هنا للإبلاغ عن المشكلة. كنت دون أن تفعل أي شيء إذا كان التطبيق يعمل بشكل طبيعي.\n\n عرض الوقت حتى يتم استبعاده من قبلي/string> إعدادات التصفية
Critical and urgent (missed calls, directions, emergency alerts)
Important (communications, important emails)
Normal (+notifications from old apps)
Non-important (software updates, junk mail)
Contextual and background info (weather, expired events, suggestions)
%s seconds Popup position when unlocked Turn screen on Turn the screen on when you get a notification Opacity Theme Keep on lockscreen Keep notifications on the lockscreen until you dismiss them Dismiss on swipe Remove notifications from the drawer when you swipe them away horizontally. You can still tap the X to dismiss from the drawer. Don\'t disturb Round icons Use L\'s round icons instead of the squared icons from earlier releases Pocket detection Don\'t turn the screen on if the phone is in a pocket or facedown on a table. Lock screen Block current app Don\'t display heads-up for notifications from the current app Behaviour Playing: %s By: %s\nAlbum: %s Current song popup Display song metadata on track change.\nNote: not all music players are supported. Both the notification listener and the accessibility service is enabled. Please disable one of them. Select \'Notification Listeners\' and toggle \'Heads-up notifications\' Go to \'Accessibility\' > \'Heads-up notifications\' Select \'Heads-up notifications\' to toggle the service Open as floating window Long-tap the icon to open the notification as a floating window. Experimental feature, works with OmniRom and XHaloFloatingWindow. App has canceled action App didn\'t define any action Hide dismiss button Hide the dismiss button from the notifications Unlock phone Automatically unlock the phone when you open a notification.\nWARNING! This will allow ANYONE to unlock your phone, regardless of your security settings. Compact mode Only display the first line of the notification. Only on lockscreen Only display popups on the lockscreen. Privacy on lockscreen Don\'t display message contents on the lockscreen Enable this service to allow Heads-up to read your notifications.\n\nDO NOT enable the accessibility service if your device is running Android 4.3 or newer (follow instructions inside the app instead). After disabling this service, some features in Heads-up might not work properly. Enable device admin Fix \'screen stays on\' bug.
No proximity sensor detected. Pocket detection will not work. Please DON\'T report this bug. Keep screen on After turning the screen on, keep it on as long as the heads-up is visible.
Help! Test Enabling this will allow Heads-up to turn off your screen. Only use this if the screen doesn\'t turn off after displaying popups on the lockscreen, or if the pocket detection doesn\'t work properly.\n\nIMPORTANT! You will not be able to uninstall Heads-up while this feature is enabled. Already a device manager. Device provisioning is not enabled. Stopping. The service is enabled. Try sending yourself a message.\nIf it doesn\'t work, please reboot your device and try again.\nTap here if you need help The service is running. Try sending yourself a message.\nTap here if you need help. %s is blocking Heads-up from accessing your notifications. Please disable it from the accessibility menu. Export debug data
Close on outside touch Remove the popup when you touch outside the heads-up Reminder time If you swipe the heads-up upwards, Heads-up will re-display it after the number of minutes you specify here. Set to zero to disable.\nWARNING: Experimental, unstable feature. Don\'t rely on it to work. Remind me after %s minutes Popup position on lock screen
